description: Elevate your salad rotation with this Greek-style bowl of goodness. This easy recipe features juicy lamb kebabs, a hearty salad and toasted Lebanese bread: the perfect fit for busy weeknights.
name: Kebab & Bean Greek Salad Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g pkt Woolworths BBQ lamb kebabs with honey & mint
420g can no-added salt four bean mix, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat. Cook bread in batches for 1 minutes each side or until toasted. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Add kebabs to barbecue grill and grill for 7 minutes each side or until cooked through.

Open salad kit and arrange ingredients among serving bowls, reserving feta, olives and dressing. Add beans and kebabs to bowls. Drizzle with dressing and top with feta and olives. Serve with lemon wedges and bread.
